skills.name: PHARAOH'S CURSE
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Curse enemy for 2 turns.
• Cursed enemies take increased damage from all damage types.

skills.name: REGEN ALL
desc: • Heals allies based on your MAGIC stat.
• Grants Regen to allies for 3 turns.

skills.name: RECOUP
desc: Heals every ally whose HP is below 50% at the start of your turn.
